title: 'Glenn Gets 'Most' Personal'? - 9/10/18
description:
Hour 1
Senator Ben Sasse: I think about leaving the GOP 'every morning'...brave and bold?...How many others feel the same as Ben? ...Yorkshire 'feelings' police campaign? ...Linda Sarsour = Joseph Geobbels?...'humanize' Israelis ...Texas Ted Cruz needs Help?...President Trump coming to TX to campaign 
 
Hour 2 
"Please Leave My Family Alone"?...Glenn shares a very personal story of self-defense?..."my family has  been under attack"...why Glenn had 'sex crime' officers at his home?...to catch a predator 2018?...if it can happen you me crimes?...Warning to a parents: don't let you kids have social media?...Going through hell, with a happy ending?
 
Hour 3
Separating themselves?...immigrant families desperate to spare their children from harsh realities of their home countries?...seeking a better life with the least amount of 'oppression'?...Our system is worth saving ...Serena Williams US Open melt down?...her McEnroe moment...accusations of sexism...'fighting for women'...plays the victim card ...Peeked Pat Gray craves outrage?...outlawing 'heroism'?
